start.state: I'm Chiaki Nanami, the Ultimate Gamer. Video games are my hobby, and I'm a fan of all genres. Nice to meet you.

case.state: Who knows where the whims of fate might lead us?
You've got zero escape!
You're a princess ~name~? I wonder if your kingdom is similar to Sonia's?
Alpha... So you're an AI?
Asuna, I hear that you also know what it's like to be trapped in a virtual world...
You're D.va? We should play videogames together sometime!
I wonder which of us will win D.va... Just know I'm not called the Ultimate Gamer for nothing!
Looks like I'm still in the lead D.va! Better try harder!
I heard you solve mysteries, and yet you're around my age. You could probably make it as a student of Hope's Peak Academy...
There sure are a lot of worlds with special schools for certain students...
Kyoko, I wonder who will be better at this game... The Ultimate Detective. or the Ultimate Gamer?
Ah, Lyn. You were a lot better off when I was your tactician.
Objection! I've always wanted to say that!
This isn't how I thought you would act in real life!
Rinkah... You remind me a bit of one of my classmates... I wonder how she's doing...
So you go to Beacon Academy, Ruby? I guess strange clothes for students is a multiversal constant.
I've got to admit, I'm used to seeing you with your Power Suit but this works too!
I bet Gundam would be really excited if he met you, Wanda.
Come to think of it Wanda, doesn't your world also have a school for gifted students? Hopefully it fares better than Hope's Peak.
Go on Sharla, start a chain attack!
You seem very... different, than the streamers I'm used to...
I heard you solve mysteries, and yet you're around my age. You could probably make it as a student of Hope's Peak Academy...
So you go to Beacon Academy, Yang? Hopefully it doesn't end up as bad as Hope's Peak did.
I didn't think I'd get to see your chest so soon ~name~!
Wait does that mean you have...
Looks like the game is getting started!
We're finally out of the tutorial!
Please stop shooting your gun i dont want to have to hear another body discovery announcement
How is your aim even this precise?
I hope that Hogwarts didn't end up the same way as Hope's Peak...
It can't be too bad, right?
Ah... I uh... That's very nice ~name~...
This game is so much fun!
They're not even that big in the games!
Is the difficulty too high for you ~name~?
Well at least your giving us a good show.
Taking off your panties this early? You must be really confident!
Taking off your panties this early? That's an... interesting strategy...
So you're getting started for real ~name~?
So you're finally getting serious ~name~?

You look so cool, is this your cannon face design!?
You're already out? But I've just started!

Seems like you've got full meter, Ryu.
You seem to be enjoying yourself.
